```{r}
library(stringr)
```


```{r}
cleaned_poi <- read.csv("cleaned_poi.csv", colClasses = "character")
sum_footfall <- read.csv("sum_footfall.csv", colClasses = "character")
```

```{r}
head(cleaned_poi)
```

```{r}
head(sum_footfall)
```

```{r}
df <- subset(cleaned_poi, poi_name %in% sum_footfall$poi)
df <- df[order(df$poi_name), ]
df
subset(df, facebook_places_id != 0)
```

```{r}
subset(sum_footfall, poi %in% cleaned_poi$poi_name)
```

```{r}
subset(sum_footfall, !(poi %in% cleaned_poi$poi_name))
```
